name.en: Aqara H1 Wall Switch Single (With Neutral)
name.nl: Aqara H1 Wall Switch Single (With Neutral)
name.de: Aqara H1 Wall Switch Single (With Neutral)

instruction.en: Press and hold any of the switch button for more than 8 seconds until the blue light flashes three times after release
instruction.nl: Press and hold any of the switch button for more than 8 seconds until the blue light flashes three times after release
instruction.de: Drücke einen beliebigen Knopf länger als 8 Sekunden. Nach dem los lassen blinkt das blaue Licht 3 Mal.
